mapper.select: select a.id,b.title,c.nick_name,d.name,a.submit_date_full from psy_question_record a left join psy_question b on a.question_id = b.id left join sys_wx_user c on a.open_id = c.open_id left join sys_wx_user_info d on a.open_id = d.open_id where a.submit_date = #{today} order by a.submit_date_full desc limit 0,6
